Who is Della Beatrice Howard Robinson?

Della is famous for being Ray Charles's second wife. She was born in 1929 in Los Angeles, California, United States. She went to a school in Richmond until fourth grade.

Beatrice's parents were never married. She was raised primarily by her mother. Her father was never around. He was married to another woman and was living in Houston.

What did Della Beatrice Howard do for a living?

Ray Charles's second wife was a gospel singer. She joined Cecil Shawâ€™s church team and began singing on the radio and at concerts. She and her bandmates received a contract to perform in larger churches and theatres.

The group received a recording deal and produced several songs. Her face appeared on the covers of the CDs.

What is Della Beatrice Howard Robinson's net worth?

The former gospel singer's net worth is estimated at a whopping $15 million. She gained much of her wealth from her late husband after the divorce. According to Celebrity Net worth, he was worth $75 million at his death.

How did Della and Ray Charles meet?

Ray Charles met Della Beatrice in Texas in 1954. She was in her mid-20s when she met him and was doing well in her music profession. They met in a hotel, and she never expected to see him again after leaving. She also did not find Ray Charles impressive during their first meeting.

However, Beatrice found it baffling when she kept running into him on the road. Much later, she discovered that these frequent meetings were not a coincidence. They tied the knot on April 5th, 1955.

They had their wedding in a back room filled with junk. A woman they had never met read them their vows. They had their first child, a son called Ray Charles Jr, in May 1955.

Over the next few years, they welcomed two more sons. David Robinson was their second child, and Robert Robinson is their third son.

Why did Ray Charles and Beatrice Howard divorce?

Ray Charles's wife Della Beatrice Howard Robinson was put off by the singer's continuous cheating. He had an infamous affair with Mary Ann Fisher. Additionally, Ray allegedly began seeing two other women two years after his marriage. These women were Margie Hendricks and Mae Mosely Lyles.

The mother of three children filed for divorce in 1976. However, the details of the separation were kept out of the press. Charles Ray died on June 10th, 2004, due to complications resulting from liver failure.

How many times was Della Beatrice Howard Robinson married?

Charles and Della had been married and divorced before meeting each other. Beatrice was married twice. She has never disclosed the man she was first married to.

Her ex-husband began to abuse her physically whenever he was unhappy. As a result, divorced him and went home to Houston. He later tied the knot with Charles, but their marriage ended after 22 years.

Ray Charles was also married before. Her first marriage was to Eileen Williams Robinson. It ended in a divorce. They did not have any children.

Where Is Della Beatrice Howard Robinson now?

Ray Charles's ex-wife has been out of the limelight for a while now. In 2010, she was living in Riverside County in stable health. Therefore, it is impossible to tell where she is now and how she is doing.
